Subject: Re: Thunder Hammer Reporting To Black Aracnia
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 41
From: JP3884@...

    Paralysis ran down the hatch, and was careful to CLOSE it behinde him. He 
dove for cover behinde several fallen tress and poked up to fire at Grim 
Reaper. He was useing his semiautomatic machine gun. It was a rapid fire 
device that was fantastically accurate.
    
    Inside, Black Aracnia stared at the blue print of the ship and useing the 
keyboard began to activate the defense systems. The shiled started, a dozen 
Autoguns burst to life attacking the intruders, and inside the ship the 
corridor internal defences swung down from the ceiling and were on full alert.
    "Ah, nothing like having Fort Knox as a base!" She giggled as she got up 
from her chair and armed herself with her signiture bowcaster. She opened the 
ramp, exited, and CLOSED it behinde her. Joining Paralysis, she aimed at Rush 
and sent a misslebow flying towrds him.


    Aerostreak was the one who heard the gunfire first. Grappler and Gunatix 
began to worry, along with the Maximals as they drew closer to the vessle. Te 
journey wasnt that far actually, and they were surprized they didnt find 
anyone on the trip.
    "I dont like it, not one bit!" Grappler hissed as he looked at the battle 
unfolding. He held his bowcaster, similar to Aracnias, close to him.
    "Well, we had better get down there and meet up with our Commrads. Its 
now or never." Gunatix said as the group began to head towrds the battle, 
wepons drawn and battle ready.

    Adrax looked down at the sixsome heading for the battle. New arrivals 
were always open game to mess with. He could bring them to Aracnia as a 
present. Three warriors with three Maximal prisoners would be very diplomatic.
